q: Moreover, says Slezak, Simon Cowell was someone who could deliver "succinct, brutally honest and witty" critiques in an off-the-cuff fashion. " Simon Cowell was the voice of the people," he says. He had a very specific skill that not everyone can pull off. Even Ellen DeGeneres , who has been an Oscar host couldn't do it- and that was a shock to me. But the judges are just one piece of the equation. Clearly, "Idol" won't truly regain its spark unless it gives viewers a charismatic cast of contenders. Many believe that, in recent

Richard Hamilton scored 24 points and Allen Iverson added 23 as the Pistons won for the second straight time to open their four-game road trip after losing their first two games with Allen Iverson . Former Republican state Rahm Emanuel Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race last year against Democratic Rahm Emanuel Joe Donnelly in northern Indiana, said she was excited by the prospect of Mike Pence running for governor. I think he's the clear frontrunner and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said. "I think he'd clear the field." , but rivals are nipping at its heels. The Chrysler Town and Country was the top-selling minivan in the U.S. last year, with sales of 112,275, or about 4,000 more than the Honda Odyssey. We are not going to give up one inch of territory, Sergio Marchionne said. Chrysler said the 2011 versions of its minivans have a new V-6 engine with improved fuel economy. One amenity is an optional heated steering wheel, a first among minivans.
